replies.body:
What sort of crash are you experiencing exactly with the client?  With a bit more information I should be able to work with you and we can stop this from happening again.  Just need a little bit more info about the crash first!  Do you get an error message?  What does it say?

Let me know!
it changes all the time sometime you get into a game but it stays black or you get into a lobby and everything is missing

Hmmm...from the sounds of it, there may be some sort of weird connection issue going on.  Essentially, PvP.net (the client) is trying to give information to your computer, but that information isn't reach you.  In order to make sure that this doesn't happen again, we are going to need to start ruling out some different root causes to get to the heart of it.  To that end, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).  It has some of the most common solutions that should prevent this.

Give me another heads up if you are still experiencing issues!
